main.name: Kevin Ojijo
main.occupation: Cloud Engineer and the Forensic Guy from 254
main.description: I enjoy solving cases. Explains my love for Financial Crime Investigations.
main.bio: Hello! I am Kevin! I call myself a professional tourist. I currently work as a Cloud Engineer since May 2022. Previously worked as a Systems Engineer at Safaricom PLC (Kenya), Advisory Associate at PricewaterhouseCoopers (Kenya), Survey Officer and Customer Installation Technician at Poa Internet (Kenya). I enjoy learning new technologies and mentoring other people. Ohh, I also love photography and still looking for a camera

work.title: Cloud Engineer
work.description: Cloning and Google things to get paid. We also run some infrastructure on AWS and GCP and I am very keen in ensuring they're up
